title: This smart pint glass tracks your beer intake, will request a cab if you’re too drunk to drive
text:
This smart pint glass tracks your beer intake, will request a cab if you’re too drunk to drive 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
While other smart mugs/cups/bottles offer dubious features like hydration alerts or a reminder of what liquid you're currently drinking, ePi...
